sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUMMONS, in law, a citing or calling a perſon to any court, to anſwer a complaint or to give his evidence.

Summons, in war. To summon a place, is to ſend a drum or trumpet to command the governor to surrender, and to declare that if the place be taken by ſtorm, all muſt ſubmit to the mercy of the conqueror. See Capitulation and Chamade.
